item.title: AI v The Mind: Meet the world's first artist robot - BBC.com
item.description:
1. AI v The Mind: Meet the world's first artist robot  BBC.com

item.title: Eddie Van Halen's brother wants AI to complete the band's unreleased music - Fox News
item.description:
1. Eddie Van Halen's brother wants AI to complete the band's unreleased music  Fox News

  4. Alex Van Halen Hasn’t Retired: ‘I’ll Die With Sticks In My Hand’  Van Halen News Desk

item.title: AI-generated child sexual abuse imagery reaching ‘tipping point’, says watchdog - The Guardian
item.description:
1. AI-generated child sexual abuse imagery reaching ‘tipping point’, says watchdog  The Guardian
